Man with broken neck gets sick of waiting, leaves hospital: Cory Urlich says he begged for a bed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-with-broken-neck-gets-sick-of-waiting-leaves-hospital-cory-urlich-says-he-begged-for-a-bed/ RQC4YXJIDFCCPODL3Y5VX73WHE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-with-broken-neck-gets-sick-of-waiting-leaves-hospital-cory-urlich-says-he-begged-for-a-bed/ RQC4YXJIDFCCPODL3Y5VX73WHE/ Raphael Franks"They just didn't take my concerns seriously," Urlich reflects on his ordeal. Wed, 23 Oct 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Cory Urlich broke his neck but got to fed up waiting in the waiting room to be seen at the Waikato Hospital emergency department he decided to go home, only to find out days later he had indeed broken his neck. Photos / Melissa Nightingale
